titles.title: To designate the visitor center and other related facilities at the U.S.S. Arizona Memorial in Hawaii as the "Pearl Harbor Memorial Site".
To designate the visitor center and other related facilities at the U.S.S. Arizona Memorial in Hawaii as the "Pearl Harbor Memorial Site".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

bill.summary: Designates the visitor center, museum, bookstore, exhibits, and other related facilities located on the shore at the U.S.S. Arizona Memorial in Hawaii as the Pearl Harbor Memorial Site.
